titles: A pleasant posie, or Sweete nosegay of fragrant smellyng flowers: gathered in the garden of heaunely pleasure, the holy and blessed bible. To the tune of The black Almayne.
author: Symon, John.
publisher: by Richard Johnes: dwellyng in the vpper end of Fleetlane,
notes: Verse: "A stock of flowers, bede wed with showers ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
